sense.name: Arrange text, data, or other objects in a certain configuration or to certain specifications.
sense.examples: We have to format the data before we can run the parsing algorithm. Format this memo so it can be printed out. We have to format materials in XML.

sense.name: Divide a computer disk into marked sectors so that it may store data, consequently erasing old data on the disk.
sense.examples: Please format this disk before entering the data. It used to be that you had format disks before using them on your computer; now you can buy them preformatted. I need to format this disk for Windows.
